content: Investments Asked by Hong Min LinAsked on 28 Apr 2019Any recommendations for products that can give 3% compounded returns sustainably? 3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019If you do not require access to cashflow, and can wait a long time, CPF SA and endowment policies give you 3-5% annually.2 comments2

Alan Kor28 Apr 2019I will be very careful to say that endowment policies give 3-5% returns

not all endowment policies are the same in terms of their funds and maturity period

more conservative to say ard 1-3% non-guaranteedHariz Arthur Maloy28 Apr 2019Different products will be different granted. But most almost all 20/25 year endowment policies will pull off north of 3% to low 4% return.

Ang Yee Gary, Medicine at National University Of SingaporeLevel 4. ProdigyUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Cpf special account.
U can top up cash up to 7k a year to your own account for  tax savings and 7k to your parents.If this is useful, please up vote me.3 comments1

See all 3 comments Ang Yee Gary28 Apr 2019Https://www.prudential.com.sg/products/savings/other-savings-goals/pruwealth-ii-sgd#overview

Capital is guaranteed after 10 years. I doubt u get 4 percent
Where did you get the info from?Alan Kor28 Apr 2019Agent pitch as usual lol
